name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pomotasking: Tasks lists with Pomodoro Timer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome Pomodoro timer with ToDo list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Manage your tasks easily with ToDo lists and pomodoro technique integrated in a very straightforward app.

It's open source, come help us to improve Pomotasking: https://github.com/samuelsimoes/pomotasking
